reviewText: This is the best! It teaches counting as well as has lots of Count Von Count time. My child loves him! It's a lot of fun and educational as well.
Loved it!
good to watch
Good video, we watch a few times a day. My daughter loves it. Also fun to watch bc some of the attitude portrayed with the characters my husband and i even find entertaining.

My almost 2 year old watches this on the Fire Stick every day after we get home from work/ day care. The Count is one of her favorites and she asks for him by name "Ah Ah". I was happy to find one that featured him and also didn't follow the Elmo's World format (we watch Elmo's World Pets every night at bedtime). I also recognize some of the songs and clips from my childhood lol.
Have a 100 Sesame Street DVDs. All are excellent educational entertainments tools

Our son LOVES this video! He is just shy of turning two. This is one of the only videos that truly captures his attention (allowing Mama to tidy up/cook), AND he is actually learning numbers. He points to numbers and says "eight", etc. Win-win!
My son loves Elmo so I give it best rating since it entertains and at the same time educates my 3 year old kid.
My 3 year old son is obsessed with counting as well as this show!  He asks to watch it everyday and his counting is rapidly improving~
Arrived quickly and was as described.  Works great.
Very short my lo loves count von count.
trying to get the cout to count somoning on video could have been a story in itslf
The picture seemed on the dark side....I had to adjust my TV settings when we watch it. Other than that its a good DVD if your kids like sesame street characters.
Can't go wrong with over 2 hours of Elmo and the Count!
Two year old grandson loves it.

My 20-month old LOVES this video. It took a couple of weeks for her to get into it, but now she asks for it by name (she calls it Ah Ah!, the Count's catch phrase). It's fun for her, and has a few jokes thrown in for the grown-ups too.
:) son loves elmo so of course he loves this!
My toddler loves this video so much--not only did she sneak the purchase herself, but I find her singing the songs all day long!!  :-)
Two yr old granddaughter loves it!
My son ADORES Elmo and learning numbers! Highly recommended.
